column4:
['Are hat hai are hat hai are baju ho ja', '
Hurr pahalwan', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar beta shor chala chal jor se', '
Ham dono ka bandha hai bandhan ha', '
Ham dono ka bandha hai', '
Bandhan prit pyar ki dor se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar bitwa shor chala chal jor se', 'Idhar bhi parwat udhar bhi parwat', '
Bich mein nadiya nale bail ji,', '
Bich mein nadiya nale', '
In jhrno ki taal pe mitwa', '
Koi ragni gale bail ji', '
Koi ragni gale', '
Door khet mein dekh morni haye', '
Door khet mein dekh morni', '
Ishaq kare hai mor se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar bitwa shor chala chal jor se', 'Dekhle suraj sar pe', '
Aya baj gaye pure barah', '
Bail ji baj gaye pure barah', '
Are main khaunga chana', '
Bhatura tum kha lena chara', '
Bail ji, tum kha lena chara', '
Khane ki khusbu ayi hai aay haye', '
Khane ki khusbu ayi hai us dhabe ki or se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar beta shor chala chal jor se', 'Sahar mein jakar tum chup rahna', '
Dekh ke dhandhe kale', '
Bail ji dekh ke dhandhe kale', '
Tan ke ujale log waha', '
Par lekin mann ke kale', '
Bail ji lekin mann ke kale', '
Nili chatri wala dekho haaye', '
Nili chatri wala dekho', '
Dekh raha hai gor se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar bitwa shor chala chal jor se', '
O mere pyare bail chala chal jor se', '
Mat kar bitwa shor chala chal jor se.']
